Text:
This is most definitely a restored or remastered version.  I own the DVD and it looks like shit, while the blu-ray looks pristine:

DVD screen: http://bayimg.com/laNLaAADG

Blu Ray screen: http://bayimg.com/laNlEaadg

As anyone can see the DVD was soft, with poor colour and even the aspect ratio was not quite right. In other words it was the normal very shitty MGM classic movie DVD release.  The Blu Ray is flawless.
